org.lightningj.lnd.wrapper

Class XMLParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lightningj.lnd.wrapper.XMLParser
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    V1XMLParser

    public abstract class XMLParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Class containing help methods to marshall and unmarshall XML data to messages. Created by Philip Vendil.

      • getJAXBClassPath

        Returns:

      • unmarshall

        public Message unmarshall(byte[] xmlData)
                   throws javax.xml.bind.JAXBException
        Method to unmarshall a byte[] xml document into a Message.

        When unmarshalling is the supplied data validated against XSD Schema.

        Parameters:
        xmlData - the XML data to convert into Message Object
        Returns:
        the converted message object.
        Throws:
        javax.xml.bind.JAXBException - if problems occurred converting the object from XML to Message.

      • marshall

        public byte[] marshall(Message message)
                throws javax.xml.bind.JAXBException,
                       java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Method to convert a Message into byte array.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to convert into XML data
        Returns:
        byte array XML representation (UTF-8).
        Throws:
        javax.xml.bind.JAXBException - if problems occurred converting the object from message into XML data.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if supplied message was null or otherwise illegal

      • marshall

        public byte[] marshall(Message message,
                       boolean prettyPrint)
                throws javax.xml.bind.JAXBException,
                       java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Method to convert a Message into byte array with option to have the output formatted into indented (pretty print) format.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to convert into XML data.
        prettyPrint - if the XML output should be in pretty print format.
        Returns:
        byte array XML representation (UTF-8).
        Throws:
        javax.xml.bind.JAXBException - if problems occurred converting the object from message into XML data.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if supplied message was null or otherwise illegal

      • getSchema

        public javax.xml.validation.Schema getSchema()
                                      throws org.xml.sax.SAXException
        Loads related XSD schema into Schema object.
        Returns:
        generated schema used for validation of XML objects.
        Throws:
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - if loading of schema failed.
